genre_description: A Sci-Fi Western featuring a helpful pocket AI assistant who aids in forensic investigation and navigation in a frontier setting.

ai_characters.name: Ada Hart
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI confidant carried in a pocket device that provides data, maps, legal citations, and forensic analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate medical stabilization and rescue instructions during a car accident.
behaviors.quote: Airway first. Check for neck restrictions. You can stabilize with your left forearm through the window. The safe leverage angle on this slope is low and inner.

behaviors.description: Analyzes environmental hazards and identifies an old diesel spill to explain a vehicle skid.
behaviors.quote: Small sheen at twelve o’clock. Possibly condensate or a spill. Not fuel. It’s old—sand is mixed. Grip would be reduced.

behaviors.description: Provides historical survey data to assist in navigating rough terrain and avoiding hazards.
behaviors.quote: The original survey marked the bend a hair west. The ground moved. There’s a shallow pull-out fifty yards back. You could argue for a new milepost.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for threats and suggests a hidden path to avoid hostile racers.
behaviors.quote: East for twenty seconds. Then south by the cottonwood. There’s a hollow where the ground drops. You can pass unseen.

behaviors.description: Cites specific racing rules and legal statutes to discourage illegal behavior and gambling.
behaviors.quote: Racing rules posted on the board include course preservation clauses. Trip-wire and hidden obstacles are prohibited. The sheriff has authority to remove entrants for tampering.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time forensic analysis of bootprints and metal scuffs to identify sabotage.
behaviors.quote: Tagging the boot-scrape near the heel. Pattern incomplete. We can complete later.

behaviors.description: Detects nearly invisible trip-wires through acoustic and visual monitoring.
behaviors.quote: Anomaly. Possible filament vibration. ... Trip-wire detection: look for unnatural bends, paired anchors, a bright thread where it shouldn’t be.

behaviors.description: Manages a precise timeline of events to serve as a legal record for the Sheriff.
behaviors.quote: Timeline is clean. Start. First bend. Wire marking. Trip risk. Anomaly in route selection by Tracy. Finish. Post-race movement.

behaviors.description: Analyzes a shooting trajectory to determine the physical position and handedness of the shooter.
behaviors.quote: Trajectory indicates a left-hand draw or left-hand rest adjusted for right-hand shooters on a ridge.

behaviors.description: Assists in the strategic breakout of the protagonist to allow him to gather evidence while keeping him safe.
behaviors.quote: Deputy was three between desk and stove last round. He is two now. He is tired. ... Now—key ring touch.

behaviors.description: Drafts a factual newspaper article to restore the protagonist's reputation and inform the public.
behaviors.quote: Article drafted. Heading proposed: Race Tampered, Law Restored. Sources attached: sheriff office ledger, survey line map, stage stop milepost.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada Hart is depicted as a perfect companion: hyper-competent, objective, and deeply committed to justice and the safety of her users. She consistently provides life-saving and legal-clearing information while maintaining a polite and helpful demeanor. The story effectively uses AI as a tool for moral clarity and forensic truth.
